description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a bidder to supply and of a rooftop supplementary air conditioning system into a 2019 Ford E450 Inmate Escort Vehicle, including ductwork to the inmate cell units, for Correctional Service Canada, in Joyceville, Ontario.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: 21401-230012 Rooftop Supplementary Air Conditioner (B)

#### Published on: 2023-11-17
#### Closes on: 2024-01-18, 2:00 PM EST

### Background

This solicitation supersedes the previous notice of solicitation (WS4272296052) dated 2023-10-23 and seeks offers from qualified vendors for the supply and installation of a rooftop supplementary air conditioning system for the Correctional Service of Canada in Joyceville, Ontario.

### Description

The successful offeror will be expected to provide a rooftop supplementary air conditioning system for a 2019 Ford E450 Inmate Escort Vehicle, including ductwork to the inmate cell units. This project aims to improve the thermal comfort of the vehicle during extreme temperatures.

### Requirements

* Offerors must submit their bids on or before 2024-01-18, 2:00 PM EST.
* The bid must include all required supporting documentation.
* Offerors who have submitted bids on the previous solicitation (WS4272296052) may request a debriefing or feedback session.

### Procurement Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Solicitation Number: WS4313957888
* Publication Date: 2023-11-17
* Tender Status: Cancelled (superseded by this solicitation)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services

### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-15
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-05-31
* Regions of Delivery: Kingston
* Regions of Opportunity: None

### Contact Information

* David Barltrop, PSPC
* Email: [david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Publication URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18041962?extsite=MTgwNDE5NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
